sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct compound_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id FROM apidb.PubChemCompound

sqlQuery.name: SubstanceId
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT subst.substance_id,comp.compound_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id FROM apidb.PubChemSubstance subst, apidb.PubChemCompound comp WHERE subst.property='CID' AND subst.value =to_char( comp.compound_id )

sqlQuery.name: Synonymns
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, s1.value as compound_id, apidb.tab_to_string(set(CAST(COLLECT(s2.value) AS apidb.varchartab)),', ') as synonymns FROM APIDB.pubchemsubstance s1, APIDB.pubchemsubstance s2 WHERE s1.property = 'CID' AND s2.property = 'synonymns' AND s1.substance_id = s2.substance_id GROUP BY s1.value
